page.title: 17STROUD POLICE STATION
page.content: {Map Ref:-858052 { { The new police station is in Parliament Street.It was built in 1974.It has ten cells, two ladies and eight mens. Stroud police station has three courts two Magistrates and one Juvenile. You can stay in the police force for 30 years. Stroud police station has three interveiw rooms two in the cell area and one on the top floor. They have two big vans ,two small ones, one dog van , three CID cars and four to five other vehicles. The police replace their trousers every two years and uniforms every three years.
